content:
I'm glad you had an amazing experience watching the Lakers play the Celtics at the Staples Center! As I mentioned earlier, I don't have real-time information, but I can suggest ways for you to find out about the Lakers' upcoming home games.

You can check the official Los Angeles Lakers website (nba.com/lakers) or the Staples Center website (staplescenter.com) for their schedule and ticket information. They usually have a calendar of upcoming games, including home games, and you can purchase tickets online or through their box office.

Additionally, you can also check ticketing websites like Ticketmaster, StubHub, or SeatGeek, which often have listings for Lakers games and other events at the Staples Center.

If you're looking to attend a specific game or want to plan ahead, I recommend checking the Lakers' schedule for the current season and marking your calendar accordingly. You can also sign up for the Lakers' newsletter or follow them on social media to stay updated on their schedule, promotions, and ticket availability.

Remember to plan ahead, as Lakers games can be very popular, and tickets might sell out quickly!
